short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a word count for text fields on Google Forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CountMeIn! is an extension that helps users check the word count on Google Forms as grey text that appears on the corner of the textbox, similar to Google Docs. There is no functionality for a Google Forms word count, and with increasingly many applications  with Short Answer Questions confined by word limits on Google Forms, this is a quick and no effort way to see the word count displayed.
